wf_workflow_version.name: iCON Access Request UK
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
Provide iCON Access as per the details
Provide iCON Access as per the details
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

current.x_sksw_uk_itsm_request_variables = 'Access Type: ' + current.variables.access_request_type + '
' + 'User Account: ' + current.variables.please_select_the_user_account_you_would_like_to_modify.getDisplayValue() + '

' + 'company numbers: ' + current.variables.icon_company_numbers + '
